name: South Laurel High School
description: South Laurel High School is a public high school serving students in grades 9-12 in the Laurel County School District. The school provides comprehensive secondary education including academic programs, athletics, and extracurricular activities. They offer various support services including a Youth Service Center and participate in programs like the Laurel County Agency for Substance Abuse Prevention (ASAP). The school operates on a traditional academic calendar and provides transportation services.
source: Verified from official South Laurel High School website and multiple online directories
hours: Monday through Friday, 7:30 AM to 3:00 PM (school hours)
services: Secondary education, athletics, extracurricular activities, youth services, substance abuse prevention programs
eligibility: Students in grades 9-12 residing in the Laurel County School District
notes: Fax: (606) 864-0056. The school has a Youth Service Center that provides additional support services to students. They participate in various community programs including substance abuse prevention initiatives.
